799 6 1781 799 6 1781 a numer integr formula us in fourier analysi a numer integr formula is present which us unequ sampl interv the interv ar equal space on a log scale such a formul is us in fourier analysi to improv accuraci and eas of usag a complet set of formula for numer fourier analysi is given cacm januari 1968 meisel w s numer integr fourier analysi integr 5 16 ca680112 jb februari 23 1978 2 05 pm 1782 5 1782 1782 5 1782 1782 5 1782 in and out convers byan in and out convers we mean that a float point number in on base is convert into a float point number in anoth base and then convert back to a float point number in the origin base for all combin of round and truncat convers the question is consid of how mani signific digit ar need in the intermedi base to allow such in and out convers to return the origin number when possibl or at least signific digit cacm januari 1968 matula d w float point number signific base convers round truncat 3 15 5 11 ca680111 jb februari 23 1978 2 14 pm 1783 4 1783 1843 4 1783 1634 5 1783 1783 5 1783 1783 5 1783 1783 5 1783 1843 5 1783 1634 6 1783 1783 6 1783 practic error coeffici for estim quadratur error for analyt function all publish error coeffici for estim quadratur error for analyt function were comput on the assumpt that the quadratur rule wa exact for polynomi up to a given degre sinc these rule us round valu for the abscissa and weight and sinc the true valu of the integr of some of the polynomi in question have an infinit binari express the quadratur rule is not exact henc these error must be taken into consider in comput practic error coeffici cacm januari 1968 rabinowitz p numer integr quadratur truncat error theoret error coeffici practic error coeffici integr analyt function roundoff error 5 11 5 16 1785 an improv hash code for scatter storag introduc is a hash code method base on fix point divis rather than multipl or logic oper thi new method allow the hash tabl to have almost ani length also a new method of handl collis is discuss known as quadrat search thi method is faster than random search and free from the cluster that build up with a linear search cacm januari 1968 maurer w d hash satisfactori in thi paper it is contend that a program languag is best describ function as a bodi of macro instruct and that the macro call constitut a canon form in term of which a program notat mai
